main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects in Baltimore, Maryland during 1952.
interesting points: Object sighted was described as disc-shaped, approximately 40-50 feet in diameter, traveling at estimated speeds of 400-500 mph,The object was luminous, white in color, and was hovering about 300 feet in the air,The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes, Observers reported a flashing bright white light occurring about once every 60 seconds, Test firing at Aberdeen Proving Grounds produced missile trails which were likely mistaken for UFOs.
witness description: Air Force Pilot and personnel from Baltimore Filter Center
